title: 3c - Rows 4 and 5 - 7 Algorithms in a Procedure

content.question: Capture and paste two program code segments that you developed. The first program code segment must contain a student-developed procedure that implements an algorithm used in your program. The procedure must implement an algorithm that includes sequencing, selection, and iteration.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste two program code segments that you developed. The first program code segment must contain a student-developed procedure that implements an algorithm used in your program. The procedure must implement an algorithm that includes sequencing, selection, and iteration.
The second program code segment must show a call to the procedure.

Provide a written response that: (Approx. 200 words, exclusive of program code) describes in general what the identified procedure does and how it contributes to the overall functionality of the program, and
explains how the algorithm implemented in the selected procedure works in enough detail that someone else could recreate it.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Use abstraction to manage complexity in a program.
